channel.title: Synth on RCJacH
channel.description: Recent content in Synth on RCJacH

item.title: REAPER - RCMShip Perfect Pitch
item.description: Download from here: RCMShip Perfect Pitch on Github or Simply add my repository in ReaPack: RCJacH ReaPack Repository Description RCMShip (MShip stands for musicianship) Perfect Pitch is a little game for exercising Perfect Pitch, the ability to recognize notes without any reference, using adaptive method of randomization. How to Play Click START, the synth will play a tone. Guess the name of the tone by clicking on one of the note names.

item.title: Tone Sweep - REAPER JSFX Percussion Synth
item.description: You can download it from here: Tone Sweep on Github or Simply add my repository in ReaPack: RCJacH ReaPack Repository Description: This synth generates a monophonic sweeping tone when receiving a MIDI note input. Intended for designing percussive sounds, such as kicks, snares, toms, or sound FXs in electronic music genres. Quick Instruction: Set a starting and ending note. If necessary, change the Pitch Sweep Curve and length by dragging the Pitch Curve Graph, x axis for length, and y axis for curve.
